name: Simulation Pro Yakyuu
overview: Simulation Pro Yakyuu, or "Baseball Simulation", is a Japan-exclusive game that uses the actual players and teams of the 1995 Nippon Professional Baseball league but a fictitious Hect Stadium as the arena. There is a lot of information for batters and pitchers to digest like pitching tendencies, earned run averages, batting averages, and even the current wind levels. Everything is in Japanese including the menu options and the player's surnames.
